text: Marvin Panch (May 28, 1926 - December 31, 2015) was an American stock car racing driver. Panch won the 1961 Daytona 500. He also won seventeen NASCAR Grand National - now Sprint Cup Series - events during a 17-year career. He was born in Menomonie, Wisconsin. Panch died of natural causes after he was found in his car in Port Orange, Florida at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Réplica del Histórico Auto Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Wisconsin
title: Marvin Panch
